title: Intentional homicides (per 100,000 people)
name: vc.ihr.psrc.p5
readme: An intentional homicide is defined as an unlawful death inflicted upon a person with the intent to cause death or serious injury.

fields.name: Country Code
fields.description: ISO 3-digit ISO code extended to include regional codes e.g. EUR, ARB etc

fields.name: Value
fields.description: An intentional homicide is defined as an unlawful death inflicted upon a person with the intent to cause death or serious injury.
